column4: Guys I am trying to copy files from CD to PC using command line, in the shell I receive for every file an output like this : cp: reading `/media/cdrom0/Folder/File': Input/output error .. All the files are copied, but I don't understand why I recieve such error! what is that?
are all the files reallt copied?
then I have no idea.. but if I were you I'd check the md5 sums of the cd and the files on the hard drive.. just to be sure
well.. cd's have all kinds of neat redundency info.. so there might be an error that it could fix
